attributes.action: Change all conditional offers for university’s to unconditional!
attributes.additional_details: students studying a levels, level 3 or access to he course have been told they will not be doing any more work as of 20th march 2020. All other outstanding work after this date will be predicted. This is unfair especially to students returns education after years out. First assignments wouldn’t be great as it’s all new and second assignments would of been better but not the standard they’re capable of doing. So it shouldn’t be predicted this will reduce marks and chance of going to uni in sep
attributes.background: So i want the government to consider this hard time for students with have been told there is no more work by Certa to allow students who have conditional offers for university in september to change the conditional offer to unconditional offer.. this allows the student to not stress and worry

rejection.details: Entry requirements are a matter for individual universities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
